body.noSimilarModelsText: No iPhone 13 Pro models are available for pickup today at nearby Apple Stores. Please check back later.

stores.pickupTypeAvailabilityText: In-Store and Curbside Pickup available at this location.

directionByLocale.en_US: From Rosecrans Ave, turn South onto Village Dr. After the first stop sign, Curbside Pickup is located on the right, before the second stop sign.

stores.pickupTypeAvailabilityText: In-Store and Curbside Pickup available at this location.

address.twoLineAddress:
10250 Santa Monica Boulevard,
Los Angeles, CA, 90067

directionByLocale.en_US: From the 405, exit Santa Monica Blvd and head East. Turn Right onto Century Park West. Turn Left into the first Parking Entrance. Stay in the Left lane for the Level P1 Entrance. Proceed past 2 stop signs into the Red Section. Turn Right at the Apple Curbside Sign (second to last aisle). Before you reach the Nordstrom P1 elevators, turn Left. The Apple Curbside Parking spaces will be on the Right.  From Beverly Hills/West Hollywood, head West on Santa Monica Blvd. Turn Left onto Century Park West. Turn Left into the first Parking Entrance. Stay in the Left lane for the Level P1 Entrance. Proceed past 2 stop signs into the Red Section. Turn Right at the Apple Curbside Sign (second to last aisle). Before you reach the Nordstrom P1 elevators, turn Left. The Apple Curbside Parking spaces will be on the Right.

Before you reach the Nordstrom P1 elevators, turn Left. The Apple Curbside Parking spaces will be on the Right. directionByLocale.en_US: When you arrive at Fashion Island, take Newport Center Drive to the stop sign, turn left. Turn left into the second opening and proceed to Curbside Pick Up spaces marked Curbside "Lot 9", this is located directly across from Lahaina Art Gallery.
